item.title: Set Up Secure Remote Computer Access
item.description:
Ever wondered how to access your computer remotely while traveling, working remotely, or at a different office? There’s a simple solution you can try for free. This technology, called remote access, allows you to securely connect to another computer and use it as if you were physically present. With remote access, you can forget about syncing files and applications between your laptop and desktop. You can directly log in to your remote desktop from your laptop to run applications, manage files, and even print remotely...
